posts.title: Getting Started with Web Development
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide for beginners looking to start their journey in web development.
posts.content:
# Getting Started with Web Development Web development is an exciting field that combines creativity with technical skills. Whether you're looking to build a career or just want to create your own website, this guide will help you get started. ## The Basics ### HTML HTML is the foundation of web development. It's used to structure content on web pages: ```html My First Website

Hello World!

``` ### CSS CSS makes your websites beautiful: ```css body { background-color: #f0f0f0; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; } ``` ### JavaScript JavaScript adds interactivity: ```javascript document.querySelector('h1').addEventListener('click', () => { alert('Hello Developer!'); }); ``` ## Next Steps 1. Learn version control with Git 2. Pick a framework (React, Vue, or Angular) 3. Practice building projects 4. Join coding communities Remember, everyone starts somewhere. Keep learning and building!
